name: Paddles 'n Balls
description:
A classic game of paddles bouncing balls around!

Features:

  • 2- or 4-player versus gameplay
  • A variety of control options
  • AI to play with or against
  • Customizable games.
    • Multiple balls in play
    • Add balls every so often
    • Change size of your paddle
    • Play at high or low speeds

This is the first game I've actually pushed out into the wild. As such, I'll use it as a testbed for trying out new things, so expect more and more features as time goes on. Please let me know about any bugs you find or suggestions you have!
